Augment.Name: 30% Acid Absorbance
Augment.Description: 30%: Passive 30% Enhancement Bonus to Acid Absorption

Augment.Name: 30% Cold Absorbance
Augment.Description: 30%: Passive 30% Enhancement Bonus to Cold Absorption

Augment.Name: 30% Electric Absorbance
Augment.Description: 30%: Passive 30% Enhancement Bonus to Electric Absorption

Augment.Name: 30% Fire Absorbance
Augment.Description: 30%: Passive 30% Enhancement Bonus to Fire Absorption

Augment.Name: Melodic Guard
Augment.Description: Melodic Guard: When being hit there is a chance for the opponent to dance.

Augment.Name: Hysteria
Augment.Description: Hysteria Guard: When being hit there is a chance for the opponent to have Bestowe Curse cast on them.

Augment.Name: Obsession
Augment.Description: Obsession Attack Proc: 100% extra threat for 15 seconds.

Augment.Name: Paranoia
Augment.Description: Paranoia Attack Proc: Half threat for 15 seconds.

Augment.Name: Delirium
Augment.Description: Delirium Guard: Displacement for 15 seconds.

Augment.Name: Solipsism
Augment.Description: Solipsism Attack Proc: Dazed for 6 seconds.

Augment.Name: Alien Mind
Augment.Description: Will Save +10: This item gives a +10 Resistance bonus to your Will saves.

Augment.Name: Uncanny Awareness
Augment.Description: Reflex Save +10: This item gives a +10 Resistance bonus to your Reflex saves.

Augment.Name: Subtle Ambition
Augment.Description: +2 to the DC of your Conjuration and Illusion spells

Augment.Name: Chaotic Ambition
Augment.Description: All of your spells gain a 1% Equipment bonus to their chance to critical hit.

Augment.Name: Acid VI
Augment.Description: Your weapon does an addition 6d4 Acid damage on a successful hit.

Augment.Name: Frost VI
Augment.Description: Your weapon does an addition 6d4 Cold damage on a successful hit.

Augment.Name: Flaming VI
Augment.Description: Your weapon does an addition 6d4 Fire damage on a successful hit.

Augment.Name: Shocking VI
Augment.Description: Your weapon does an addition 6d4 Electric damage on a successful hit.

Augment.Name: Shrieking V
Augment.Description: Your weapon does an addition 5d4 Sonic damage on a successful hit.

Augment.Name: Axiomatic V
Augment.Description: Your weapon does an addition 5d4 Law damage on a successful hit.

Augment.Name: Anarchic V
Augment.Description: Your weapon does an addition 5d4 Chaos damage on a successful hit.

Augment.Name: Solar IV
Augment.Description: Your weapon does an addition 4d4 Light damage on a successful hit.

Augment.Name: Eldritch IV
Augment.Description: Your weapon does an addition 4d4 Force damage on a successful hit.

Augment.Name: Improved Banishing
Augment.Description: On Hit: 4 to 24 Bane damage to Outsiders. On Vorpal Hit: If an outsider struck by this weapon has fewer than 1500 Hit Points, it is instantly slain. If the outsider has above 1500 Hit Points, it takes 150 damage.

Augment.Name: Improved Vorpal
Augment.Description: Passive: +0.5[W] damage dice. On Vorpal Hit: If your target has fewer than 1500 Hit Points, it is instantly slain. If the target has above 1500 Hit Points, it takes 150 damage.

Augment.Name: Dazing VI
Augment.Description: On Hit: Your target suffers a -1 Penalty to Will Saving Throws for 6 seconds. This effect sacks up to 5 times. This effect may only occur on-hit once every three seconds. Passive: The DC of the saving throw to resist your Stunning Blow and Stunning Fist combat feats is increased by 11

Augment.Name: Deception VI
Augment.Description: 5% Chance on Hit: Your target becomes Bluffed for four seconds. On sneak Attack: +6 to Attack Rolls, +12 to Damage.

Augment.Name: Doublestrike 6%
Augment.Description: +6% Enhancement bonus to Doublestrike chance.

Augment.Name: Ghostbane VI
Augment.Description: This weapon is attuned specifically to hurt ethereal monsters, dealing an additional 6d4 bane damage vs. Incorporeal monsters. Passive: This weapon has ghost touch and bypasses ethereal monster's 50% chance to evade bane damage.

Augment.Name: Heartseeker VI
Augment.Description: +6% Enhancement bonus to Doublestrike chance.

Augment.Name: Improved Disruption
Augment.Description: On Hit: 4 to 24 Bane damage to Undead. On Vorpal Hit: If an undead struck by this weapon has fewer than 1500 Hit Points, it is instantly slain. If the undead has above 1500 Hit Points, it takes 150 damage.

Augment.Name: Improved Smiting
Augment.Description: On Hit: 4 to 24 Bane damage to Constructs. On Vorpal Hit: If an undead struck by this weapon has fewer than 1500 Hit Points, it is instantly slain. If the construct has above 1500 Hit Points, it takes 150 damage.

Augment.Name: Riposte VI
Augment.Description: When missed by an attack: Deals 6 to 24 damage to your attacker. Passive: +3 Insight bonus to AC and a +3 Insight bonus to saves.

Augment.Name: Stumbling VI
Augment.Description: On Hit: Your target suffers a -1 Penalty to Reflex Saving Throws for 6 seconds. This effect sacks up to 5 times. This effect may only occur on-hit once every three seconds. Passive: The DC of the saving throw to resist your Trip combat feats is increased by 11.

Augment.Name: Deception VIII
Augment.Description: 5% Chance on Hit: Your target becomes Bluffed for four seconds. On sneak Attack: +8 to Attack Rolls, +16 to Damage.

Augment.Name: Doublestrike 8%
Augment.Description: +8% Enhancement bonus to Doublestrike chance.

Augment.Name: Ribcracker VIII
Augment.Description: On Critical Hit: 8d6 Bludgeoning damage from weapons with a x2 Critical Multiplier, 8d8 damage from weapons with a x3 Critical Multiplier, and 8d10 damage from weapons with a x4 or Greater Multiplier.

Augment.Name: Riposte VIII
Augment.Description: When missed by an attack: Deals 8 to 32 damage to your attacker. Passive: +4 Insight bonus to AC and a +4 Insight bonus to saves.

Augment.Name: Greater Smiting
Augment.Description: On Hit: 4 to 24 Bane damage to Constructs. On Vorpal Hit: If an undead struck by this weapon has fewer than 2000 Hit Points, it is instantly slain. If the construct has above 2000 Hit Points, it takes 200 damage.

Augment.Name: Conjuration Focus V
Augment.Description: Passive: +5 Equipment bonus to the DC to resist your Conjuration spells.

Augment.Name: Enchantment Focus V
Augment.Description: Passive: +5 Equipment bonus to the DC to resist your Enchantment spells.

Augment.Name: Evocation Focus V
Augment.Description: Passive: +5 Equipment bonus to the DC to resist your Evocation spells.

Augment.Name: Necromancy Focus V
Augment.Description: Passive: +5 Equipment bonus to the DC to resist your Necromancy spells.

Augment.Name: Transmutation Focus V
Augment.Description: Passive: +5 Equipment bonus to the DC to resist your Transmutation spells.

Augment.Name: Acid VIII
Augment.Description: Your weapon does an addition 8d4 Acid damage on a successful hit.

Augment.Name: Frost VIII
Augment.Description: Your weapon does an addition 8d4 Cold damage on a successful hit.

Augment.Name: Flaming VIII
Augment.Description: Your weapon does an addition 8d4 Fire damage on a successful hit.

Augment.Name: Shocking VIII
Augment.Description: Your weapon does an addition 8d4 Electric damage on a successful hit.

Augment.Name: Shrieking VII
Augment.Description: Your weapon does an addition 7d4 Sonic damage on a successful hit.

Augment.Name: Axiomatic VII
Augment.Description: Your weapon does an addition 7d4 Law damage on a successful hit.

Augment.Name: Anarchic VII
Augment.Description: Your weapon does an addition 7d4 Chaos damage on a successful hit.

Augment.Name: Solar VI
Augment.Description: Your weapon does an addition 6d4 Light damage on a successful hit.

Augment.Name: Eldritch VI
Augment.Description: Your weapon does an addition 6d4 Force damage on a successful hit.

Augment.Name: Greater Vorpal
Augment.Description: Passive: +0.5[W] damage dice. On Vorpal Hit: If your target has fewer than 2000 Hit Points, it is instantly slain. If the target has above 2000 Hit Points, it takes 200 damage.

Augment.Name: Axeblock VII
Augment.Description: Reduces physical damage taken by 14, except from Bludgeoning or Piercing weapons.

Augment.Name: Bashing VII
Augment.Description: On Shield Bash: 4 to 16 additional Bludgeoning damage. On Melee Hit: +% Chance to automaticlly hit your enemy with a Shield Bash attack.

Augment.Name: Insightful Combat Mastery +4
Augment.Description: +4 Insight bonus to the DC to resist Trip, Improved Trip, Sunder, Improved Sunder, Stunning Blow and Stunning Fist attempts.

Augment.Name: Deathblock VII
Augment.Description: +21% Enhancement Bonus to Negative Energy Absorption. In addition, you are immune to magical effects that can cause instant death.

Augment.Name: Hammerblock VII
Augment.Description: Reduces physical damage taken by 14, except from Slashing or Piecring weapons.

Augment.Name: Riposte VII
Augment.Description: When missed by an attack: Deals 7 to 28 damage to your attacker. Passive: +4 Insight bonus to AC and a +3 Insight bonus to saves.

Augment.Name: Spearblock VII
Augment.Description: Reduces physical damage taken by 14, except from Bludgeoning or Slashing weapons.

Augment.Name: Vitality +35
Augment.Description: +35 Vitality bonus to Hit points.

Augment.Name: Combustion +120
Augment.Description: Your fire based spells have better effect

Augment.Name: Corrosion +120
Augment.Description: Your acid based spells have better effect

Augment.Name: Glaciation +120
Augment.Description: Your cold based spells have better effect

Augment.Name: Impulse +120
Augment.Description: Your force based spells have better effect

Augment.Name: Magnetism +120
Augment.Description: Your electic based spells have better effect

Augment.Name: Amaunator's Blessing
Augment.Description: When all three items from the set are equipped, you will gain a 10% Enhancement discount to the Spell Point cost of all your spells.

Augment.Name: Woodsman's Guile
Augment.Description: When all three items from the set are equipped, you will gain a +4 bonus to your To-Hit and +6 bonus to your Damage on any attack that would be considered a Sneak Attack.

Augment.Name: Knight's Loyalty
Augment.Description: When all three items from the set are equipped, you will gain a +3 artifact bonus to your To-Hit and Damage rolls, and a +3 Insight bonus to Natural Armor.
Augment.Type: Embrace of the Spider Queen Armor Commendation Upgrade

Augment.Name: Way of the Sun Soul
Augment.Description: When all three item from the set are equipped and you are in a centered state, you will gain +2 artifact bonus to To-Hit and Damage rolls. In addition, when you roll a natural 20 on an attack roll that is confirmed as a critical hit, you will gain temporary benefit based on the elemental stance you are in, if any.

Augment.Name: Battle Arcanist
Augment.Description: When all three items from the set are equipped, you will gain a 10% Enhancement discount to the Spell Point cost of all your spells.

Augment.Name: Exceptional Combat Mastery +5
Augment.Description: Passive: +5 Insight Bonus to the DC of your Trips, Sunder, and Stunning Blow attacks.

Augment.Name: Shatter +10
Augment.Description: This effect gives a +10 enhancement bonus to the DC to resist the character's Sunder and Improved sunder attempts.

Augment.Name: Stunning +10
Augment.Description: Gives +10 to the DC of any Stunning Blow attempts made with that weapon. This weapon also has a 3% chance on-hit to make DC 33 fortitude check to stun the monster.

Augment.Name: Vertigo +10
Augment.Description: This effect gives a +10 Enhancement bonus to the DC to resist the character's Trip and Improved Trip attempts.

Augment.Name: Tendon Slice 10%
Augment.Description: This effect gives a 6% chance to Hamstring the target for each attack that does damage.

Augment.Name: Nullification +120
Augment.Description: Your Negative/Poison based spells have better effect

Augment.Name: Devotion +120
Augment.Description: Your positive based spells have better effect

Augment.Name: Radiance +120
Augment.Description: Your light and alignment based spells have better effect

Augment.Name: Fiery Detonation
Augment.Description: This weapon is imbued with a fiery wrath. On an attack roll of 20 which is confirmed as a critical hit this burning power will be released, dealing damage to the target and all enemies near it for 15d6 fire damage. A successful Fortitude save (DC 39) reduces this by half.

Augment.Name: Flaming Burst
Augment.Description: This weapon is sheathed in fire. The weapon deals an extra 1 to 6 fire damage each hit. In addition, critical hits deal an additional 1 to 10 fire damage for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 2 to 20 for a x3 critical multiplier and 3 to 30 for a x4 multiplier.

Augment.Name: Radiance
Augment.Description: This weapon is imbued with a brilliant, radiant power that deals an additional 4 to 24 points of light damage and blinds the target on a successful critical hit.

Augment.Name: Disruption
Augment.Description: On Hit: 4 to 24 Bane damage to Undead. On Vorpal Hit: If an undead struck by this weapon has fewer than 1000 Hit Points, it is instantly slain. If the undead has above 1000 Hit Points, it takes 100 damage.

Augment.Name: Holy Burst
Augment.Description: A holy weapon is imbued with holy power. This power makes the weapon good-aligned and thus bypasses the corresponding damage reduction. It deals an extra 2 to 12 points of damage against all of evil alignment and an extra 3 to 18 on a critical for weapons with a x2 critical multiplier, 4 to 24 for a x3 multiplier, and 5 to 30 for x4 multiplier.

Augment.Name: Greater Good
Augment.Description: This weapon is infused with the ultimate power of good. It does an additional 2 to 12 damage to non-good targets and can only be wielded by good aligned characters.

Augment.Name: Epic Fire 1st Upgrade
Augment.Description: Grants Greater Maiming and Greater Fiery Detonation

Augment.Name: Epic Fire 2nd Upgrade
Augment.Description: Grants Greater Flaming Blast, Purple Augment Slot and Epic Elemental Evil Set Bonus

Augment.Name: Epic Water 1st Upgrade
Augment.Description: Grants Greater Maiming and Greater Freezing Gale

Augment.Name: Epic Water 2nd Upgrade
Augment.Description: Grants Greater Icy Blast, Purple Augment Slot and Epic Elemental Evil Set Bonus

Augment.Name: Epic Earth 1st Upgrade
Augment.Description: Grants Greater Maiming and Greater Acid Torrent

Augment.Name: Epic Earth 2nd Upgrade
Augment.Description: Grants Greater Acid Blast, Purple Augment Slot and Epic Elemental Evil Set Bonus

Augment.Name: Epic Air 1st Upgrade
Augment.Description: Grants Greater Maiming and Greater Electric Storm

Augment.Name: Epic Air 2nd Upgrade
Augment.Description: Grants Greater Shocking Blast, Purple Augment Slot and Epic Elemental Evil Set Bonus

Augment.Name: +13 Strength
Augment.Description: +13 Enhancement bonus to Strength

Augment.Name: +13 Dexterity
Augment.Description: +13 Enhancement bonus to Dexterity

Augment.Name: +13 Constitution
Augment.Description: +13 Enhancement bonus to Constitution

Augment.Name: +13 Intelligence
Augment.Description: +13 Enhancement bonus to Intelligence

Augment.Name: +13 Wisdom
Augment.Description: +13 Enhancement bonus to Wisdom

Augment.Name: +13 Charisma
Augment.Description: +13 Enhancement bonus to Charisma

Augment.Name: +6 Insightful Strength
Augment.Description: +6 Insightful bonus to Strength

Augment.Name: +6 Insightful Dexterity
Augment.Description: +6 Insightful bonus to Dexterity

Augment.Name: +6 Insightful Constitution
Augment.Description: +6 Insightful bonus to Constitution

Augment.Name: +6 Insightful Intelligence
Augment.Description: +6 Insightful bonus to Intelligence

Augment.Name: +6 Insightful Wisdom
Augment.Description: +6 Insightful bonus to Wisdom

Augment.Name: +6 Insightful Charisma
Augment.Description: +6 Insightful bonus to Charisma

Augment.Name: +3 Quality Strength
Augment.Description: +3 Quality bonus to Strength

Augment.Name: +3 Quality Dexterity
Augment.Description: +3 Quality bonus to Dexterity

Augment.Name: +3 Quality Constitution
Augment.Description: +3 Quality bonus to Constitution

Augment.Name: +3 Quality Intelligence
Augment.Description: +3 Quality bonus to Intelligence

Augment.Name: +3 Quality Wisdom
Augment.Description: +3 Quality bonus to Wisdom

Augment.Name: +3 Quality Charisma
Augment.Description: +3 Quality bonus to Charisma

Augment.Name: Completed Weapon
Augment.Description: This item is fully completed, and as a result deals an additional 0.5[W] damage.

Augment.Name: Purple Augment Slot (Sharn)
Augment.Description: Adds a Purple Augment slot to your weapon

Augment.Name: Armor-Piercing +1
Augment.Description: +1 Enhancement bonus to Bypass enemy fortification

Augment.Name: Fetters of Unreality
Augment.Description: This item is cruel and deadly, and leaves behind wounds that affect both the body and the soul. This weapon has a chance to inflict multiple stacks of Vulnerable. Vulnerable: You take 1% more damage for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 20 times, and loses one stack on expiration.

Augment.Name: Conjure Radiant Bolt
Augment.Description: This weapon can summon its Radiant Bolt - The Everstar - at will once per day. The Everstar can explode on impact, dealing Light damage to your enemies in an area.

Augment.Name: Utter Disintegration
Augment.Description: This weapon has a dark, insidious power deep within. Occasionally, this power lashes out violently at enemies and attempts to disintegrate them. This disintegrate is incredibly powerful, and will utterly destroy weaker foes.

Augment.Name: Combustion/Fire Lore
Augment.Description: Fire Lore +5%: Passive: Your Fire spells gain a +5% Equipment bonus to their chance to Critical Hit. Combustion +30: Passive: +30 Equipment bonus to Fire Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Devotion/Healing Lore
Augment.Description: Healing Lore +5%: Passive: Your Healing spells gain a +5% Equipment bonus to their chance to Critical Hit. Devotion +30: Passive: +30 Equipment bonus to Positive Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Nullification/Void Lore
Augment.Description: Void Lore +5%: Passive: Your Negative/Poison spells gain a +5% Equipment bonus to their chance to Critical Hit. Nullification +30: Passive: +30 Equipment bonus to Negative/Poison Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Magnetism/Lightning Lore
Augment.Description: Lightning Lore +5%: Passive: Your Electric spells gain a +5% Equipment bonus to their chance to Critical Hit. Magnetism +30: Passive: +30 Equipment bonus to Electric Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Impulse/Kinetic Lore
Augment.Description: Kinetic Lore +5%: Passive: Your Force, Physical, and Untyped spells gain a +5% Equipment bonus to their chance to Critical Hit. Impulse +30: Passive: +30 Equipment bonus to Force, Physical, and Untyped Spells Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Corrosion/Acid Lore
Augment.Description: Acid Lore +5%: Passive: Your Acid spells gain a +5% Equipment bonus to their chance to Critical Hit. Corrosion +30: Passive: +30 Equipment bonus to Acid Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Resonance/Sonic Lore
Augment.Description: Sonic Lore +5%: Passive: Your Sonic spells gain a +5% Equipment bonus to their chance to Critical Hit. Resonance +30: Passive: +30 Equipment bonus to Sonic Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Sovereighn Vorpal
Augment.Description: Passive: +0.5[W] damage dice. On Vorpal Hit: If your target has fewer than 3000 Hit Points, they are Instantly Slain. If your target has above 3000 Hit Points, they take 300 damage.

Augment.Name: Aligned
Augment.Description: This weapon transmutes into a form that is able to bypass any alignment based Damage Reduction. (Chaotic, Good, Evil, Lawful)

Augment.Name: Dismagicka
Augment.Description: Adds Shattermantle to weapon attacks. When a Shattermantle weapon strikes a foe that has spell resistance, the value of that spell resistance is reduced by 3 for 9 seconds. A fe can only have its SR reduced by one Shattermantle effect at a time.

Augment.Name: Feareater
Augment.Description: Upgrade an item to provide a Sovereign Nightmares. On Vorpal Hit: If your target has below 5,000 Hit Points, a burst of pure terror emanates from this weapon, snuffing out its life as if it were the subject of a Phantasmal Killer spell. If your target has above 5,000 Hit Points, they instead take significant Force damage.

Augment.Name: Intelligence +22
Augment.Description: Enhancement bonus to Intelligence

Augment.Name: Legendary Fusible Sceptre of Magnetism
Augment.Description: This magical sceptre is attuned to Electric spells.
Augment.EffectDescription: Lightning Lore +21%: Passive: Your Lightning gain a +21% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.
Magnetism +142: Passive: +142 Equipment Bonus to Electric Spell Power.
Insightful Magnetism +71: Passive: +71 Insight Bonus to Electric Spell Power.
Evocation Focus +5: Passive: +5 Equipment bonus to the DC to resist your Evocation spells.

Augment.Name: Legendary Fusible Sceptre of Impulse
Augment.Description: This magical sceptre is attuned to Force spells.
Augment.EffectDescription: Kinetic Lore +21%: +21% Equipment Bonus to Force, Physical and Untyped Spells chance to Critical Hit.
Impulse +142: Passive: +142 Equipment Bonus to Force Spell Power.
Insightful Impulse +71: Passive: +71 Insight Bonus to Force Spell Power.
Evocation Focus +5: Passive: +5 Equipment bonus to the DC to resist your Evocation spells.

Augment.Name: Legendary Fusible Sceptre of Glaciation
Augment.Description: This magical sceptre is attuned to Cold spells.
Augment.EffectDescription: Ice Lore +21%: Passive: Your Cold gain a +21% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.
Glaciation +142: Passive: +142 Equipment Bonus to Cold Spell Power.
Insightful Glaciation +71: Passive: +71 insight Bonus to Cold Spell Power.
Evocation Focus +5: Passive: +5 Equipment bonus to the DC to resist your Evocation spells.

Augment.Name: Legendary Fusible Sceptre of Corrosion
Augment.Description: This magical sceptre is attuned to Acid spells.
Augment.EffectDescription: Acid Lore +21%: Passive: Your Acid gain a +21% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.
Corrosion +142: Passive: +142 Equipment Bonus to Acid Spell Power.
Insightful Corrosion +71: Passive: +71 insight Bonus to Acid Spell Power.
Conjuration Focus +5: Passive: +5 Equipment bonus to the DC to resist your Conjuration spells.

Augment.Name: Legendary Fusible Sceptre of Combustion
Augment.Description: This magical sceptre is attuned to Fire spells.
Augment.EffectDescription: Fire Lore +21%: Passive: Your Fire gain a +21% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.
Combustion +142: Passive: +142 Equipment Bonus to Fire Spell Power.
Insightful Combustion +71: Passive: +71 insight Bonus to Fire Spell Power.
Evocation Focus +5: Passive: +5 Equipment bonus to the DC to resist your Evocation spells.

Augment.Name: Legendary Malleable Sceptre of Resonation
Augment.Description: This magical sceptre is attuned to Sonic spells.
Augment.EffectDescription: Sonic Lore +21%: Passive: Your Sonic spells gain a +21% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.
Resonance +142: Passive: +142 Equipment Bonus to Sonic Spell Power.
Insightful Resonance +71: Passive: +71 Insightful Bonus to Sonic Spell Power.
Magical Sheltering +33: This item provides a +33 Enhancement bonus to your Magical Resistance Rating.

Augment.Name: Legendary Malleable Sceptre of Reconstruction
Augment.Description: This magical sceptre is attuned to Repair spells.
Augment.EffectDescription: Repair Lore +21%: Passive: Your Repair and Rust spells gain a +21% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.
Reconstruction +142: Passive: +142 Equipment Bonus to Repair and Rust Spell Power.
Insightful Reconstruction +71: Passive: +71 Insightful Bonus to Repair and Rust Spell Power.
False Life +50: This item grants the wearer +50 enhancement bonus to maximum health.

Augment.Name: Legendary Malleable Sceptre of Radiance
Augment.Description: This magical sceptre is attuned to Light spells.
Augment.EffectDescription: Radiance Lore +21%: +21% Equipment Bonus to Light and Alignment Spells chance to Critical Hit.
Radiance +142: Passive: +142 Equipment Bonus to Light and Alignment Spell Power.
Insightful Radiance +71: Passive: +71 Insight Bonus to Light and Alignment Spell Power.

Insightful Wizardry +134: Passive: +134 insight Bonus to Spell Points. (If you have Sorcerer or Favored Soul levels, you gain additional spell points proportionate to the ratio of those levels to other classes).

Augment.Name: Legendary Malleable Sceptre of Nullification
Augment.Description: This magical sceptre is attuned to Negative Energy and Poison spells.
Augment.EffectDescription: Void Lore +21%: Passive: Your Negative/Poison energy spells gain a +21% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.
Nullification +142: Passive: +142 Equipment bonus to Negative/Poison (Necrotic) Spell Power.
Insightful Nullification +71: Passive: +71 Insight bonus to Negative/Poison (Necrotic) Spell Power.
Necromancy Focus +5: +5 Equipment bonus to the DC of Necromancy spells.

Augment.Name: Legendary Malleable Sceptre of Devotion
Augment.Description: This magical sceptre is attuned to Positive spells.
Augment.EffectDescription: Healing Lore +21%: Passive: Your Healing spells gain a +21% Equipment Bonus to their chance to Critical Hit.
Devotion +142: Passive: +142 Equipment Bonus to Healing Spell Power.
Insightful Devotion +71: Passive: +71 Insightful Bonus to Healing Spell Power.
Physical Sheltering +33: This item provides a +33 Enhancement bonus to your Physical Resistance Rating.
